Package system

Interface Summary
Destructible This is the Destructible interface class that has the method die.
Moveable This interface Moveable contains the methods needed to move an object in the Bomberman game.
 

Class Summary
Bomb The Bomb class represents the Bomb object in the game and detonates after a specific period of time in the game.
Boss This Boss class represents the Boss enemy in Java.
Enemy The Enemy class represents the enemies in the Bomberman Game.
Explosion The class Explosion represents the event that occurs when the Bomb dies.
GameEngine The class GameEngine represents the central hub of the Bomberman game.
GameGraphics The GameGraphics class represents all the graphics in the bomberman game.
GamePhysics The GamePhysics represents all the physics within the Bomberman game.
GameStatus The GameStatus class contains all the information about the game at any given time.
Ghost The class Ghost represents the ghost enemy in the Bomberman Game.
HardBlock The class HardBlock/code> represents the Hard Block object in bomberman.
LivingUnit The class LivingUnit represents all living units in the bomberman game (enemy, player) it extends class MapObject and implements the interface Moveable.
MapObject The class MapObject represents all objects on the map.
NonLivingUnit The class NonLivingUnit represents the location of a non-living object in the Bomberman game.
Player The class Player and represents all the characteristics of the player.
Powerup The class Powerup represents the types of powerups available in the game.
SoftBlock The class SoftBlock reprents the soft block object in the bomberman game.
Sound The class Sound represents the sounds of the Bomberman Game.
 

Enum Summary
Difficulty This enum documents the difficulty settings in Bomberman.
GamePhysics.CollisionType This enum represents the various types of collisions in the game
